page.title: 14HOUSES
page.content: IN OUR HOUSE WE HAVE 7 ROOMS,WHICH IS A COUNCIL HOUSE.IN THE MORE EXPENSIVE HOUSE THEY HAVE ABOUT 8 OR 9 ROOMS.WITH MORE COSTLY FURNITURE.THE COUNCIL HOUSES COST ABOUT 10,000 POUNDS TO BUY. IT COST ABOUT 56 POUNDS A MONTH TO RENT.IN OUR KITCHEN WE HAVE A MICROWAVE, TWO FRIDGE FREEZES AND A FRIDGE.WE ALSO HAVE A COOKER AND CUPBOARDS TO KEEP OUR PLATES AND COOKING UTENSILS.IN OUR DINING ROOM WE HAVE CHAIRS A TABLE & A BOOK SHELF.AND IN OUR FRONT ROOM WE HAVE A SOFA TWO ARM CHAIRS A TELE & A VIDEO.THE HOUSES WITH 8 OR 9 ROOMS COST ABOUT 15,000 POUNDS.THE KIND OF FURNITURE THAT IS IN THESE HOUSES IS THE SAME AS IN MY HOUSE BUT A LOT MORE EXPENSIVE. THEY LOOK LIKE THEY COST MORE COMPARED TO THE COUNCIL HOUSES THEY HAVE THINGS LIKE THATCH ROOFS.
